item.title: Free Synthwave Twitch Overlay Bundle
item.description:
Synth Twitch Panel Bundle

A free collection of Synthwave Twitch panels, screens, webcam, and overlay designed to give your stream a unique synthwave vibe. Includes editable SVG's.

⬇ Download Bundle

Contact

Feel free to reach out with any questions, feedback, or business inquiries.

  • 📧 Email: email@avendettaforyou.dev

Disclaimer

The information provided by AVendettaForYou (“we,” “us,” or “our”) on this website is for general informational purposes only. All content, including text, images, videos, and other materials, is provided “as is” without warranties of any kind, either express or implied.

We make no representations or warranties about the accuracy, reliability, completeness, or timeliness of the content. Any reliance you place on such information is strictly at your own risk.

Privacy Policy

Welcome to avendettaforyou.dev. Your privacy is important to us.

Information We Collect

We collect personal information you provide directly (such as email addresses when subscribing) and certain data automatically through cookies and similar technologies, including IP addresses and browsing behavior.

Use of Information

We use this information to:

  • Improve your experience on our website
  • Serve relevant ads through third-party services like Google AdSense
  • Analyze website traffic and usage patterns

Google AdSense and Cookies

Our site uses Google AdSense, which may place cookies and collect data about your browsing habits to deliver personalized ads. Google’s use of cookies enables it to serve ads based on your prior visits to our site or other sites on the internet.

Terms & Conditions

Welcome to AVendettaForYou. By accessing or using this website, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.

Use of Website

You agree to use this website only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe the rights of others or restrict or inhibit anyone else’s use and enjoyment of the website.

You must not use this website to transmit or distribute any material that is unlawful, harmful, defamatory, obscene, or otherwise objectionable.

item.title: Donate
item.description:
Thank You for Considering a Donation!

Your support helps me continue creating digital art, videos, and gaming content. Here's how your contribution makes a difference:

  • 💻 Fund subscriptions to essential creative software like MidJourney and Adobe Creative Cloud.
  • ⏰ Enable me to dedicate more time to producing content by covering operational and living expenses.
  • 🌐 Cover website hosting, domain, and technical upkeep for a smooth online experience.
  • 🎵 License music, fonts, and digital assets that enhance my projects.
  • 🤝 Support collaborations with other artists and creators to bring fresh ideas to life.
  • 📦 Cover costs for printing, merchandise, and shipping (if offered).
  • 🚀 Help with promotion and advertising to grow the community.
  • 🌍 Fund accessibility features like captions, translations, and adaptive formats.

If you’d like to support, you can donate via PayPal:
